unitControlModule.stateFactories.actions.executableActions

Class RetreatActionSteerInRetreatVectorDirection

  • java.lang.Object
    • javaGOAP.GoapAction
      • unitControlModule.stateFactories.actions.executableActions.BaseAction
        • unitControlModule.stateFactories.actions.executableActions.RetreatActionGeneralSuperclass
          • unitControlModule.stateFactories.actions.executableActions.RetreatActionSteerInRetreatVectorDirection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GroupableAction, SteeringVectorGenerator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RetreatActionSteerInRetreatVectorDirectionTerran_Marine_Stimmed, RetreatActionSteerInRetreatVectorDirectionTerran_VultureMicro

    public class RetreatActionSteerInRetreatVectorDirection
extends RetreatActionGeneralSuperclass
implements SteeringVectorGenerator
    RetreatActionSteerInGoalDirection.java --- A Retreat Action with which a PlayerUnit (!) moves away from an enemy. This Action's retreat Path has a fixed length and is turned around the Unit until not collision with the map's boundaries are detected. ChokePoints are ignored in this calculation.
    Notice:
    The length of the retreat path being taken has to be greater than the DIST_TO_GATHERING_POINT from the superclass of this Action since this determines when the Action is finished!
    Author:
    P H - 05.06.2017

      • generateGeneralizedRetreatVector

        public Vector generateGeneralizedRetreatVector(javaGOAP.IGoapUnit goapUnit,
                                               bwapi.Pair<bwta.Region,Polygon> regionPolygonPairUnitIsIn)
        Use a generalized Vector which combines all direction-Vectors from all sources influencing the Unit. This generalized Vector is the retreat Vector emerging from the Unit in regards to the closest enemy Unit in it's confidence range.
        Specified by:
        generateGeneralizedRetreatVector in interface SteeringVectorGenerator
        Parameters:
        goapUnit - the executing Unit.
        regionPolygonPairUnitIsIn - the Pair of Region and Polygon the Unit is currently inside of.
        Returns:
        a Vector containing all direction Vectors influencing this Unit.
